    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes a servo motor

      • attach

        public void attach(int pin)
        Attaches a servo motor to a GPIO pin
        Parameters:
        pin - GPIO pin

      • attach

        public void attach(int pin,
                   int minPulse,
                   int maxPulse)
        Attaches a servo motor to a GPIO pin using custom pulse widths
        Parameters:
        minPulse - minimum pulse width in microseconds (default: 544, same as on Arduino)
        maxPulse - maximum pulse width in microseconds (default: 2400, same as on Arduino)

      • write

        public void write(float angle)
        Moves a servo motor to a given orientation
        Parameters:
        angle - angle in degrees (controls speed and direction on continuous-rotation servos)

      • attached

        public boolean attached()
        Returns whether a servo motor is attached to a pin
        Returns:
        true if attached, false is not

      • detach

        public void detach()
        Detatches a servo motor from a GPIO pin
